ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: i also put it away for many months and then for the last few weeks have usually been the puller for my groups in sebilis.  yes it still gets resisted a lot but
ygData.messageBody:
i also put it away for many months and then for the last few weeks have
usually been the puller for my groups in sebilis. yes it still gets
resisted a lot but it's still the next best thing to a tank who is high
enough level to pull singles.

Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> lament works forever. i've used it in mistmoore to break the
> castle. i've used
> it in the sentinel room in lower guk to break the 3 spawn.
> i've used it in unrest
> in the torture room. one tip is to stay as far back as you
> can when you lament.
> it seems they are less likely to aggro on you if it fails.
